sections.title: Our Mission
sections.content: DazLng was born from the vision of making Lightning Network node management accessible to everyone. Our mission is to democratize access to analysis and optimization tools for Lightning node operators, whether they are beginners or experts.

sections.title: Our Story
sections.content: Founded in 2024, DazLng has quickly evolved to become a reference in the Lightning Network ecosystem. Our team combines technical expertise and innovative vision to create tools that transform how operators manage their nodes.
items: 2024: Integration of AI for personalized recommendations

sections.title: Our Team
sections.content: Our team consists of Bitcoin and Lightning Network enthusiasts, combining expertise in development, data analysis, and node operations.
items: Full-stack developers specialized in Lightning Network

sections.title: Our Vision
sections.content: We believe in a future where every Lightning node operator can optimize their performance through intelligent and accessible tools. Our vision is to contribute to the growth and stability of the Lightning Network by providing innovative solutions.
items: Contribution to the Lightning Network ecosystem

sections.title: Our Values
sections.content: Our core values guide every decision and development:
items: Transparency in our analyses and recommendations
Support and education of our community
Security and reliability of our services

cta.title: Ready to optimize your Lightning node?
cta.subtitle: Discover the power of AI to maximize your earnings
